data.name: Conqueror's Blade - Sun and Sea Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Without the ocean and the light, there would be no life. Use the power of the rays and waves to dominate the battlefield with the Sun and Sea Bundle, which includes:

  • Solar Order Hero Attire: Set the sun on your enemies' lives with this bright and majestic attire.
  • Sea Devils Unit Attire: Infuse the power of the sea god Njord into your troops with this blue attire.
  • Tree of Life Banner: Honour the holiest of Norse emblems by flying this banner of the Yggdrasil tree.
  • 5x 10-Battle Unit XP Cards: Reward your Units with enhanced XP!
  • 5x 10-Battle Hero XP Cards: Get more out of each battle with increased experience.
  • 5x Unit Medals: Boost your Unit’s XP with these tokens.

HOW TO REDEEM:
To assign your new items to your characters in Conqueror’s Blade, head over to your web inventory and sign in with your Conqueror’s Blade account.

Without the ocean and the light, there would be no life. Use the power of the rays and waves to dominate the battlefield with the Sun and Sea Bundle, which includes:

  • 5x 10-Battle Unit XP Cards: Reward your Units with enhanced XP!
  • 5x 10-Battle Hero XP Cards: Get more out of each battle with increased experience.
  • 5x Unit Medals: Boost your Unit’s XP with these tokens.

HOW TO REDEEM:

data.short_description: Set sail for sunnier shores with shimmering sets of Hero and Unit Attire, a Banner, and more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 2GB / AMD HD 5870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / AMD R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
